name: Dinari BLK
description: The Dinari BLK dShares token (BLK.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in BlackRock Inc., the worldâ€™s largest asset management company. Each BLK.d token is fully collateralized by a corresponding BlackRock share held securely in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, BLK.d offers investors easy access to BlackRock shares, enabling 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and improved liquidity. This tokenized equity bridges traditional finance and blockchain, empowering investors to engage with one of the most influential companies in global finance.
